dev_enabled_message: Developer options are now enabled throughout the app.
dev_disabled_message: Developer options are now disabled throughout the app.

about.title: About Bitkit
about.text:
Bitkit hands you the keys to your money, profile, contacts, and web accounts.

This <easterEgg>Orange Pill</easterEgg> was carefully crafted by Synonym Software Ltd.
about.op_message: Download Bitkit, Your Ultimate Bitcoin Toolkit. Handing you the keys to reshape your digital life. {appStoreUrl}

general.unit_note: Tip: Quickly toggle between Bitcoin and {currency} by tapping on your wallet balance.

security.title: Security And Privacy
security.clipboard: Read clipboard for ease of use
security.footer: When enabled, you can use {biometryTypeName} instead of your PIN code to unlock your wallet or send payments.

backup.title: Back Up Or Restore
backup.failed_message: Bitkit failed to back up wallet data. Please check your connection.

support.text: Need help? Report your issue from within Bitkit, visit the help center or reach out to us on our social channels.
support.report_text: Please describe the issue you are experiencing or ask a general question.
support.placeholder_message: Describe the issue or ask a question
support.text_success: Thank you for contacting us! We will try to get back to you as soon as possible.
support.text_unsuccess: Something went wrong while trying to send your issue or question. Please try again.

full_backup.title: Latest Full Data Backup
full_backup.error: Failed to complete a full backup

adv.monitored_address_types_update_descripti: Changes will take full effect after app restarts.
adv.cs_max_description: Sort by and use smallest UTXO first. Higher fee, but hides your largest UTXO's.
adv.cs_min_description: Sort by and use largest UTXO first. Lowest fee, but reveals your largest UTXO's.
adv.cs_consolidate_description: Use all available UTXO's regardless of the amount being sent. Use this method when fees are low in order to reduce fees in future transactions.
adv.pp_header: Choose how you prefer to receive money when users send funds to your profile key.
adv.reset_desc: Are you sure you want to reset the suggestions? They will reappear in case you have removed them from your Bitkit wallet overview.

addr.no_funds_receiving: No funds found under the {addressType} address type, receiving addresses up to index {index}.
addr.no_funds_change: No funds found under the {addressType} address type, change addresses up to index {index}.
addr.no_addrs_with_funds: No addresses with funds found when searching for "{searchTxt}"
addr.no_addrs_str: No addresses found when searching for "{searchTxt}"
addr.rescan_error_description: Bitkit was not able to check the address balances.
addr.spend_number: {count, plural, one {Spend {fundsToSpend} bitcoin From # address} other {Spend {fundsToSpend} bitcoin From # addresses}}
addr.spend_all: {count, plural, one {Spend All Funds From # address} other {Spend All Funds From # addresses}}

es.error_host: Please specify a host to connect to.
es.error_port: Please specify a port to connect to.
es.server_error_description: Bitkit could not establish a connection to Electrum.

gap.gap_limit_update_description: Changes will take full effect after app restarts.

rgs.update_success_description: You may need to restart the app once or twice for this change to take effect.
